metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0512 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in NPM url-parse prior to1.5.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0512` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
